Preconditions: User is on the online banking login page.
Test Steps: 1. Click on the 'Forgot Password?' link. \n2. Check if the password reset link is sent to the registered email.
Expected Result: A password reset link is sent to the registered email.

Preconditions: User has requested a password reset.
Test Steps: 1. Open the email inbox. \n2. Locate the password reset email. \n3. Click on the reset link.
Expected Result: The reset link directs the user to the password reset page.

Preconditions: User is on the password reset page.
Test Steps: 1. Enter a new password. \n2. Confirm the new password. \n3. Click on 'Reset Password'.
column6: and user is redirected to the login page.

Preconditions: User is on the password reset page.
Test Steps: 1. Enter a new password that does not meet the security criteria. \n2. Confirm the new password. \n3. Click on 'Reset Password'.
Expected Result: An error message is displayed indicating password criteria not met.

Preconditions: User has requested a password reset.
Test Steps: 1. Wait for the password reset link to expire (if applicable). \n2. Attempt to use the expired link.
Expected Result: An error message is displayed indicating the link has expired.
